title: Veterinary check day
text: Veterinary check day. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. We use gloves and masks when handling chemicals. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy.
